title: Emirates Airline's Dnata exposure to Thomas Cook 'not a small amount': executive
text:
Emirates Airline's Dnata exposure to Thomas Cook 'not a small amount': executive

Stock Markets 58 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 01:41AM ET)

DUBAI (Reuters) - Emirates Airline President Tim Clark said the group's Dnata unit's exposure to the bankrupt holiday operator Thomas Cook is "not a small amount". The airline's capacity has been "adjusted and aligned" after it saw a "flattening of growth", he also told a conference in Dubai. Emirates' capacity is about the same as this time last year, he said.

Emirates Airline's Dnata exposure to Thomas Cook 'not a small amount': executive
